body.name: PayLessHere 39 Inch Modern Z-Shaped Computer Desk for Home Office with Headphone Hook - Sturdy Workstation Table with Spacious Desktop,Red
deliveryMessages: $19.99 delivery Monday, February 26. Order within 6 hrs 25 mins.
features: Large Surface: With a spacious desktop measuring 39 inches wide, you'll have ample space to spread out your work, accommodate dual monitors, or create an inspiring setup for creativity and productivity.

Multi-Function Design: Our desk is more than just a place to put your computer. It features a built-in headphone hook, keeping your workspace organized and clutter-free. Additionally, the desk has multiple storage shelves and cable management options to keep your workspace tidy and efficient.

Z-Shaped Structure: The Z-shaped design not only adds a contemporary touch to your home office but also provides exceptional stability. This innovative of z shape computer desk’s structure ensures wobble-free usage, even during intensive tasks, making it a durable and reliable choice.

Multi-purpose: This desk isn't limited to just office work. Its versatile design makes it suitable for gaming, crafting, writing, or even as a stylish vanity table. Adapt the desk to your needs and enjoy its functionality.
Easy to Install: Setting up your new office desk is a breeze. The step-by-step assembly instructions and included hardware make the desk easy for anyone to put together, saving you time and effort.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Z-Shaped structure : Elevate your workspace with our Z-Shaped Structure Desk – a perfect blend of modern design and functionality. Crafted with premium materials, this desk not only adds a touch of elegance to your office or home but also offers exceptional stability and durability. Its unique Z-shaped frame provides ample legroom and ensures your workspace remains clutter-free. Upgrade your office setup today with this stylish and versatile desk. Corner Table Stands: Enhance your workspace with our Z-shaped corner table stands, designed exclusively for our versatile computer desk. Crafted from durable materials, these stands offer stability and style, ensuring your desk is not only functional but also a visual centerpiece. Elevate your productivity and aesthetics with this essential addition to your home office. Adjustable foot: Introducing our Adjustable Foot for Z-Shaped Desks – the perfect solution to customize your workspace for ultimate comfort and stability. Say goodbye to wobbly desks and uneven surfaces as our high-quality adjustable foot ensures your Z-Shaped desk stays rock-solid on any floor. With easy installation and a sleek design, elevate your productivity and style with this essential desk accessory today!

Carbon Fiber Texture Surface: Enhance the sophistication of your workspace with our Carbon Fiber Texture Surface for Z-Shaped Structure Desks. Crafted with precision, this surface not only adds a touch of modern elegance but also offers a durable and scratch-resistant work area. Its unique carbon fiber texture not only looks sleek but also provides a comfortable and smooth writing or typing experience. Elevate your desk's aesthetics and functionality – choose the Carbon Fiber Texture Surface for your Z-Shaped desk today! Headphone Hook: Maximize your desk space and keep your headphones within arm's reach with our Z-Shaped Structure Desk Headphone Hook. Designed to seamlessly attach to the Z-shaped frame of your desk, this hook is the perfect accessory to keep your workspace organized and clutter-free. Its sturdy construction ensures your headphones stay secure, while its sleek design complements the aesthetics of your desk. Declutter your workspace and keep your headphones easily accessible – add this hook to your Z-shaped desk today! Perfect Conner: Achieve a seamless and polished look for your Z-Shaped Structure Desk with our Perfect Corner accessory. Designed to fit snugly and effortlessly into the desk's corner joints, this add-on not only enhances the desk's stability but also ensures a clean and professional appearance. Say goodbye to uneven edges and make the most of your workspace by adding the Perfect Corner to your Z-Shaped desk today.

Product Description Upgrade your home office or create a stylish and functional workspace with our Z-Shaped Computer Desk. Its modern design, durability, and array of features make it the perfect addition to any home office or study. Experience improved productivity and comfort while elevating the aesthetics of your workspace with this versatile desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've found this happends to be the best price, I've looked several times and places . Fast shipping, easy to assemble, holds a full size computer and some rgb lights. Great sticker decals as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the money
reviews.reviewText: This is a desk that is great for a smaller room or kids room. It’s got a great gaming design. Easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best desk ever!
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase especially at the price point. It was assembled easily and its super sturdy. I got the blue 47' and it was very spacious and smooth. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space saving desk
reviews.reviewText: Desk is perfect for a small space. This desk was purchased for my son who is a single male.easy to assemble and durable material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can't wait for the kid to see his new computer sitting on this desk on Christmas!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and is very light but sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for size!

reviews.reviewerName: I do not recommend it, Did not come with the joy stick little cove(the tiny little gray ones) in fact that is the only thing I really needed and it did not come with it 😭
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok to me
reviews.reviewText: What I liked about it is that it has a little headphone stand and the one think that I did not like that it was smaller than expected, it did fit my setup though.

The desk is not sturdy enough for a kid who plays video games such as Fortnite. These games can get pretty intense and the desk has a tipping point because of the shape of the legs. It’s also very light. I definitely recommend getting a desk that is heavier and sturdier for gaming.
